name: Starboard
description: Starboard takes staff onboarding tasks and turns them into Trello boards for shared task progress tracking and visibility.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A GitHub token to access the docs repo, at least [repo] scope

GITHUB_REPO.description: The repository containing the guides. Use the user/repo form.

HOOK_TOKEN.description: The hook secret for GitHub webhooks

TRELLO_ORGANIZATION.description: The trello organization where boards will be created
